name: Halo Jump!
description:
CHINESE LANGUAGE IS NOT SUPPORTED ON WEB BUILD

Every young child have their own dreams they want to reach and demons they want to avoid. Sometimes things go as planned but other times one falls into the hands of the unexpected reality or what seemed to be a reality. Join this little child on their journey to hold their future within their own grasp. One failure will not bring them down! Ones worst enemy is not life challenges nor demons but their own self.

Halo jump is a Mobile and/or PC endless runner game where you play as a boy avoiding devils and collecting halos.

CREDITS:

Jiaxin Huang - Main Scripter and Programmer

Melina Rosales - UI Designer/Artist and Assistant Scripter

Tasmi Islam - Character Designer and Assistant Scripter

Sophie Toon - Music and Sound Producer
